channel.title: Posts on Jonathan's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jonathan's Sports Blog

item.title: Did Nebraska Basketball Defense improve throughout the 2021-2022 Season
item.description: It’s no secret that Nebraska had a rough basketball season this year going 10-22 overall and 4-16 in the Big Ten. The team continued to drop games because of poor defense, but did the Cornhuskers defense improve at all throughout the season? Defense clearly was a struggle for the team as many fans pointed out that opposing teams would have their best shooting nights against the Cornhuskers. Did Nebraska’s opponents really shoot that well against them?
